responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[4BE4F0A16D08556ACD6685BF392E6719]", "5C033BB441A9C8A103C89ABEFE3889E0", "Tracing the surface of the pillar with your hand, you find a small, circular depression in the smooth redstone. Perhaps this pillar can be activated by some enchantment.")
name: ANV_FTUE_HR_0009_ThoseThatRemained_Pillar_Anvil_DLG_3_Response
